items:
**Items:** Warrior's Axe (Sundering Axe), Breastplate of Determination, Gladiator's Shield, Oni Hunter's Garb, Stone of Binding, Spectral Armor/Archdruid's Fury
**Shard:**  Horn Shard
**Relics:** Teleport Fragment, Purification Beads/Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Spectral against crit, otherwise Absyssal - Beads to be safe, Blink to be aggressive

**Items:** Warrior's Axe (Axe of Animosity), Phalanx, Berserker's Shield, Shogun's Kusari, Qin's Sais, The Executioner(Envenomed Executioner)/Spirit Robe
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Teleport Fragment, Purification Beads/Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Executioner for anti-healing/more damage, otherwise Spirit - Beads to be safe, Blink to be aggressive

**Items:** Bluestone Pendant (Bluestone Brooch), Transcendence, Jotunn's Wrath (Jotunn's Vigor), Gladiator's Shield, Oni Hunter's Garb, Heartseeker
**Shard:**  Horn Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Jotunn's Glyph ASAP

**Items:** Conduit Gem (Gem of Focus), Breastplate of Valor (Breastplate of Determination), Gladiator's Shield, Oni Hunter's Garb, Stone of Binding, Spectral Armor/Archdruid's Fury
**Shard:**  Horn Shard
**Relics:** Teleport Fragment, Purification Beads/Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Spectral against crit, otherwise Archdruid - Beads to be safe, Blink to be aggressive

**Items:** Bumba's Dagger (Bumba's Spear), Jotunn's Wrath (Jotunn's Vigor), Hydra's Lament, Brawler's Beatstick, Serrated Edge, Heartseeker
**Shard:**  Vibrant Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Jotunn's glyph midgame (around 4th item)

**Items:** Bumba's Dagger (Bumba's Spear), Jotunn's Wrath (Jotunn's Vigor), Transcendence, Brawler's Beatstick, Serrated Edge, Heartseeker 
**Shard:**  Vibrant Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Jotunn's glyph midgame (around 4th item)

**Items:** Bumba's Dagger (Bumba's Spear), Thistlethorn Acorn, Jotunn's Wrath (Jotunn's Vigor), Brawler's Beatstick, Hydra's Lament, Serrated Edge
**Shard:**  Vibrant Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Jotunn's glyph midgame (around 4th item)

**Items:** Eye of the Jungle (Seer of the Jungle), Atalanta's Bow, Qin's Sais, The Executioner(Envenomed Executioner), Serrated Edge, Bloodforge
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Blink Rune
**Notes:** Buy Exectioner glyph ASAP if you need antiheal, lategame otherwise

**Items:** Bumba's Dagger (Bumba's Spear), Doom Orb, Spear of Desolation/Divine Ruin, Polynomicon, Typhon's Fang, Perfected Rod of Tahuti
**Shard:**  Vibrant Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Blink Rune
**Notes:** Get Divine if you need antiheal, Desolation otherwise

**Items:** Gilded Arrow (Ornate Arrow), Devourer's Gauntlet, The Executioner (Envenomed Executioner), Demon Blade, Dominance, Deathbringer (Devoted Deathbringer) 
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Aegis Amulet
**Notes:** Get Executioner glyph ASAP if you need antiheal, otherwise after Ornate & Devoted Deathbringer

**Items:** Manikin Scepter (Manikin Mace), Devourer's Gauntlet, The Executioner (Envenomed Executioner), Qin's Sais, Titan's Bane, Odysseus' Bow
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Aegis Amulet
**Notes:** Get Executioner glyph ASAP if you need antiheal, otherwise lategame

**Items:** Bluestone Pendant (Bluestone Brooch), Transcendence, Jotunn's Wrath (Jotunn's Vigor), Fail-not, Heartseeker, Titan's Bane
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Aegis Amulet
**Notes:** Get Jotunn's glyph ASAP

**Items:** Bluestone Pendant (Bluestone Brooch), Transcendence, Jotunn's Wrath (Jotunn's Vigor), Hydra's Lament, Fail-not, Heartseeker
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Aegis Amulet
**Notes:** Get Jotunn's glyph ASAP

**Items:** Gilded Arrow (Diamond Arrow), Telkhines Ring, Hastened Ring/Cyclopean Ring, Typhon's Fang, Demonic Grip, Rod of Tahuti (Perfected Rod of Tahuti)
**Shard:**  Golden Shard
**Relics:** Purification Beads, Aegis Amulet
**Notes:** Get Hastened for more kill potential, Cyclopean for more consistent damage

**Items:** Sentinel's Gift (Sentinels Embrace), Gauntlet of Thebes, Sovereignty, Pridwen (Reverent Pridwen), Relic Dagger (Eldritch Dagger), Spectral Armor/Midgardian Mail
**Shard:**  Sturdy Shard
**Relics:** Horrific Emblem, Heavenly Wings
**Notes:** Get Spectral if the enemy team has crit, Midgardian otherwise - buy glyphs ASAP

**Items:** Benevolence (Compassion), Gauntlet of Thebes, Lotus Sickle, Pridwen (Reverent Pridwen), Relic Dagger (Eldritch Dagger), Spectral Armor/Winged Blade
**Shard:**  Sturdy Shard
**Relics:** Meditation Cloak, Heavenly Wings
**Notes:** Get Spectral if the enemy team has crit, Winged otherwise - buy glyphs ASAP
